unnormalised: Borem asa, lokanno, genes vixim uloium! Tumkam khobor asa, tumchea bhitorlea te lhan dristi poddona ani tumi Aishwarya Rai bhaxen distole ki… borem, Aishwarya Rai bhaxen nhoi hem tharaitat. Tumchem nak tumchea vhodd azacho bhau bhaxen kiteak dista vo tumkam tumchea bapachem kesh dhaktto zatalem kiteak mell’llem mhonn tumi kednaim chintlam – vo, eka vostuchi kami? Genetics-ak dosh diiat!
normalised: Bore, lokanno, genes vixim uloioum-ia! Tumkam khobor asa, tim tumchea bhitorlea chotmottea adishttannim tumi Aishwarya Rai bhaxen distale ki…bore, Aishwarya Rai bhaxen nhoi ten tharaita. Tumchem nak tumchea vhoddlea-ajjeachea mama bhaxen kiteak dista vo tumkam tumchea bapachi kes-regha kiteak mell’llea – vo ulttim, ti naxil’li? Genetics-acher dosh divo!

unnormalised: Ami genetics-achea pixeageli sonvsarant buddtat, parampara vigian, zai thoddea molecules-amni poilimchea ani fuddlea piddeanchim gupt utram uloitat. Tem Bollywood bhaxen kiteak tori asa, natki, moddneamni bhorlam, ani kednaim, khoreponnan odd ani vichitr goshtinneo astoleo. Tor tumchi chai gheiat, tumchea vichar korpache topi ghalun gheiat ani ami shodunk voium!
normalised: Ami geneticsachea pishacha sonvsarant buddantlean choltat, parampara-vigyan, zoim chotmottea rennukui atit ani bhavisachi gupt chitnnis fulail’leo asat. Tem Bollywood bhaxen asata, drama, phirkeo, ani kadam-kaddamni khoreponnan vichitr plotlines bhorl’le. Mhunnun tumcho chai dharo, tumche vicharanchi topi ghalo, ani chol’ta sodunk!

unnormalised: Poilem, te gene vostu chromosomes-cher meulteat, zai cell-achea nucleus-ant astoleat. Dor eka monxan lagim 23 chromosomes-ache jode astat, mhunnje tumchea dor eka angachea cell-ant 46 chromosomes astat (sex cells soddun). Hem chromosomal bandhann jenetik code vorun veta zai monxa-chea sharirik kaaryak choloita. Karyotype test-ak Rs. 3500 SRL Diagnostics-ant poddtole.
normalised: Poilem, te gene vostu chromosomes-ancher sampadtat, je cellachea nucleus-ant asat. Dor eklean tevis zode chromosomes asat, mhunnje tumchea dor ek cellant chalis ani sonn chromosomes asat (sex cells soddun). Hachi chromosomal manddavoll mannvi shorir vigyanacher hukum choloita. S-R-L Diagnostics-ant karyotype testak tin hazar panch rupia kharcho ieta.

unnormalised: Ata, tumkam distelea ki genetics mhunntlear fuktachi gambhir vostu zoxi jenetik rogo ani paramparagat sthitincho. Ani oi, tem asa. Thalassemia (8 Indiantlea monxan modhlo ek vorpi aasa!), Cystic Fibrosis ani Huntington’s rogo koslich haspachi vostu nhoi. Punn ami polleun, chodd korun hem tumchea fattir lagpachea vaitt sovoiank konnak dosh diunk zata hem daddun kaddpachem asa. “Maim, mhoje genes-ant asa mhunn hun gulab jamunacho narkelog!”. Tem mukt zauchim vo-jail-achim free card asa, sori?
normalised: Atam, tumkam dista astole ki genetics fakt genetic rog ani paramparan mell’l’leo condition-incher adharit asa. Ani ho, asa. Thalassemia (dor atteam-i eak Bharatiya lokak tem asa!), Cystic Fibrosis ani Huntington’s disease hanka haspachi vostu nhoi. Punn cholta, choddant-chodd hea vellar tumchea vaitt addatin khatir konnak dosh divcho ten tharavpachem asata. "Aie, tem mhojea genes-ant asa mhunnun mhaka gulab jamunachi addat laglea!" Tem mukt jivanchi vostu asa, barabor?

unnormalised: Hem vicharat gheiat: Tumi eka lognak vetat ani dor eklean lokhan Rohan apla Nana bhaxen kitleak dista mhunn “ooh-ing” ani “aah-ing” kortat. “Ekach dolle, ekach haspacho!” te uloitat. Tem genetics, baby! Vo tea aaji bai zaka hamesha sangtat, “Beta, tum tachea bapachem bhaxen kelo jelo zatat!”. Dhanyavad, Aaji, genetics apnnachench boreponnan. Mhozo dermatologist, Dr. Mehra AIIMS-ant, sangta ki Male Pattern Baldness sadharanponnan maimchea vatten mellta.
normalised: Hacho vichar kora: Tumi eka lagna-utsavant zata ani dor ek zonn kitloch Rohan tachea Nanna bhaxen dista mhunnun ooh-ing ani aah-ing kortat. "Teach dhole, teech haso!" te uloitat. Tem genetics, baby! Vo ti kaki ji sadam uloita, "Beta, tum tujea bapachi kes daddai bhaxen kortai!" Dhanyavad, kaki, genetics tichea boreponnan. Mhojea dermatologist-an, Doctor Mehra-an A-I-I-M-S-ant sanglam ki dadlea kes dhaddai aaimanachem dharonnacho cholnekecho marg matrik paxanuch mell’l’lo asta.

unnormalised: Genetics tumchea masaleanchea sangataim ek kam kortat! Kednaim tumkam duka bhogta ki tumcho ixtt mirchi bajji ek plate dollem dhukana sarke dita, ani tumi ek ghotte uprant lassi glassacho lagunk vetat? Tem gene vostu zateli, tumchea purvojanchea vatten mell’lli zannem Rajasthanchea tikhemasaleanchea curries-anchea vixayan bhirant ghali. Hanv eka lekhant vachlam ki kaim genes tumkam capsaicin-ak unne sonvedanxil kartat, zai chilli peppers-ant active ingredient asa, mhunn hem satya zaunk xakta!
normalised: Genetics tumchea masala-dharya shokticheri-ui ek bhumika nibaita! Kiteak tumcho ixtt mirchi bajji eka dhole-ani marannak na vartaun khaunda, ani tum ek ghontt lassi eka bite-ak pavoita mhunnun tumi vichar kortat? Hem gene vostu astolem, tumchea purvozank mell’l’li jen Rajasthanachea tikhat curriencher te udhle. Hanvem ek article vachlem ki khas genes tumkam capsaicin-ak kam sensetive kortat, chilli pepperan bhitor aslello sakriya ghatak, mhunnun hem sat asonk zata!

unnormalised: Jenetik testing aajkaal ghara-ghara zalolem asa. Tumi tube-achea bhitor thumkun tumchi ancestry, kaim rogancho bhirant ani tumchi khella-ghorponnachi kamai daddun kadunk zata. Tumhi gupit Mughol shahazado asa mhunn chintat? Tumkam type 2 diabetes zaunk xakta hem tumkam zann’n gheunk zai? Te vixayan DNA test asa! Mapmygenome sarkhea companies-amni ghara testing kits distat, punn tumcho family doc hem suchounk xakta.
normalised: Genetic testing ajkal sogleant lokpriya zalea. Tum tuke ek tube-ant thokunk xoktai ani tumchi gotra, tumchi khas rogachea dhokyak ani tumchi atlethic shoktik sodunk xoktai. Tum gut’trupannan ek haraullelea Mughal rajkumar achai? Tum type don diabetes-ak predispose aacha ki na tumak zannovak asa? Tuka tea khatir D-N-A test asa! Mapmygenome sarkea company-o ghara testing kitton divonk laglea punn tumche gharache doctor-ui tem suchonk xokta.

unnormalised: Punn sambhall, tumchem genome sequenced korunk ek roller coaster bhaxen zaunk xakta. Tumi sangonk naslolleo vostu mellteleo. Tumhi 2% Neanderthal asa vo tumkam Alzheimer’s rogo uprant zaunk xakta mhunn. Nirdoshiponn sukachi vostu asa, kednaim, sori? Eka fula genome sequence-ak $600 to $1000 US-ant poddtole (₹ 50,000-₹ 83,000 lagbhag).
normalised: Punn tum sovaidhan ravat, tumchea genome sequencer korunk ek rollercoaster aasonk zata. Tumka vostu mellonk zata je tumkam kadam zanno zayo nhoi aasteleo. Tem tum don percent Neanderthal aasha ki tumkam Alzheimer’s jevitan uttam dhokyo asata. Gyanchim dukha, kadam-kaddamni, barabor? Ek full genome sequenceak dollar sonn shambar dollar ek hazar (rupee ponchavanna hazar rupee ekeassi hazar lagbhag).

unnormalised: Tor, fuddlea vellak tumi ayneant polleunk ani vicharunk kiteak tumhi asa tache bhaxen kiteak asa, yad dovrat ki tem tumchea genes-amni asa. Tumchea bapaink dosh diiat, tumchea azonk dosh diiat, evolution-ak dosh diiat! Tumchekuch dosh diinakat. Ani tumkam khoremch jann’n gheunk zai zalear, vochun tumchem DNA test kara. Tumchea genes-amni kitleo gupt uktteo vostu dhoron aileat konn zannam?
normalised: Mhunnun, tum porean tumchea aeaenent polaiton kityakun tum tea ritim aasha tum zanno, tumchea geneant soglen aasa mhunnun yaad dovorat. Tumchea aie-bapaicher dosh diva, tumchea ajjeachea-ajecher dosh diva, tum evolushanak dosh diva! Tum sovem dosh naka divank. Ani tum kharaikaran umed asat, tumchem D-N-A testat. Konnak gine mhunnun tumchea gene-anim kitem luttele gineet asat?

unnormalised: Ani yad dovrat, hem thoddeakuch fun asanchem asa. Genetics gambhir xet asa zachi svasthyacho ani rogancho asli sonvsaracho arambh asa. Tor, ami paramparagat oddpan ani tikhemasaleachea sovai vixim hashtana, ami tea thoddea dristi poddonaslollea dictatoranchea atmiyoponnak ani zattivik man diium zai zannem amkam ami konn te korta. Tacho Punnett squares zatiche lagim dovrat ani khuxal jenetik xodh kortat!
normalised: Ani yaad theva, hem ek bhov mazach aasa. Genetics ek khareponnan vishayi aasa jeachi vastavik sansaran arogya ani rogancher asar karta. Mhunnun, ami paramparan utram ani tikhat jevannacher mazam choltoch, ami tea chotmottea invisiblenchi shakti ani dhokyaacho anubhav kortelim je amkam ami kortat. Tim Punnett squares hatant theva ani khushi jen-sohodni kara!
